metadata.title: CVE-2021-47579 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ovl:fix warning in ovl_create_real() Syzbot triggered the following warning inovl_workdir_create() -> ovl_create_real(): if (!err &&WARN_ON(!newdentry->d_inode)) { The reason is that the cgroup2 filesystemreturns from mkdir without instantiating the new dentry. Weird filesystemssuch as this will be rejected by overlayfs at a later stage during setup,but to prevent such a warning, call ovl_mkdir_real() directly fromovl_workdir_create() and reject this case early.
